description:
Zinio is the world's premier high-fidelity mobile reading experience, with the best magazines from around the world, in pure digital form.  Zinio lets you read and share articles from top titles, buy digital subscriptions or single issues, and manage your library on multiple devices.  Read what you like!

Join Zinio from your TouchPad and enjoy 6 free magazines today!

Features:

* Explore and read articles for free from a selection of top magazines, updated daily
* Subscribe to magazines in the Zinio store for the best value, or buy single issues
* Read full-color, high-fidelity pages
* Synchronize your library on your TouchPad, Mac or PC

What People are Saying:

"To see magazines done correctly look at Zinio." - Huffington Post
"Zinio is to magazines what Kindle is to books." - Engadget.com
"If you're a magazine devourer, this is your app." - PCMag.com

Most Popular:

Business & News - Bloomberg BusinessWeek, The Economist, HBR
For Men - Maxim, Esquire, Car & Driver, Men's Fitness, Outside
Fashion - Elle, Cosmopolitan, Marie Claire, Nylon, Harper's Bazaar, BlackBook
Home/Lifestyle - Saveur, Oprah, Dwell, Wine Enthusiast
Tech - T3, Macworld, PC World, PC Gamer, X-Box World, Layers
Science - National Geographic, The Smithsonian, New Scientist, Science
International - Vogue France, Esquire UK, Hola Mexico, GQ Japan

New Arrivals - Harpers, Computer Arts, Business Traveler, Guitar Player, Edge, Consumer Reports
